channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Rational DOORS Next Generation
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Rational DOORS Next Generation

item.title: CVE-2021-20347|2024-08-03T17:37:24.130Z -- ibm -- rational%20doors%20next%20generation
item.description: IBM Jazz Foundation and IBM Engineering products are vulnerable to server-side request forgery (SSRF). This may allow an authenticated attacker to send unauthorized requests from the system, potentially leading to network enumeration or facilitating other attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 194596.

item.title: CVE-2021-20340|2024-08-03T17:37:23.898Z -- ibm -- rational%20doors%20next%20generation
item.description: IBM Engineering products are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 194451.

item.title: CVE-2021-20357|2024-08-03T17:37:24.055Z -- ibm -- rational%20doors%20next%20generation
item.description: IBM Jazz Foundation products is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 194963.
